description: Vern is a player, he was before he got married and he still is now. His lover-boy ways have pushed his wife to the brink of jealous rage and intolerance. She had no choice but to call, The Wives Club -a group of elite, hot transsexual women who reform cheating men. Paris is assigned to Vern's case and she uses every inch of her sexy body and cock during this intervention. He is tossed down in chains on the bed and easily seduced by Paris - he even plays along until she ruthlessly jams her dick in his ass fucking him while he begs for it to stop.
title: The Wives Club: Cheaters Never Win
